about_the_game:
Join our Discord community or follow us on Twitter to interact with other players, and get the latest updates and support from our circle! We provide responses and support for all players who post questions!


Story

Originally an adventurer in a medieval fantasy world, Daiya encounters an unexpectedly strong enemy during a monster hunt. Just as she wants to activate her teleportation spell to safely return to town, she gets interrupted by the monster! Both her and the enemy suddenly get transported to the world of Kabukicho, a place set at the time of the last century.
Having no documents, no identity in this foreign world, Daiya is thankful to be offered a home by a Chinese exile called Kobeni. Having nowhere else to go, Daiya starts living in Kabukicho as a stateless person. Will she be able to find the monster that interrupted her teleportation spell?
Will she be able to defeat it and return to her own world?

Features

Freely explore Kabukicho, work part-time jobs, enjoy delicious food and encounter a variety of random events.
Experience the light-hearted story and the atmosphere of Japan’s Kabukicho district!

Mechanics

All background graphics are based on Kabukicho’s real-life layout and setting, with adjustments by the game’s developer to create a better sense of immersion.

Inspiration

I, the game’s developer, came to Japan in 2022, renting a room in the red-light district of Kabukicho because I couldn’t find another place to live. For the first time in my life, I experienced the atmosphere of a red-light district and the big city flair – a wholly new experience from having grown up on the countryside.
If I can convey even just a little bit of the fun of Kabukicho via this game, then its creation will have been meaningful to me.

The content of the game is purely fictional. The developer is not a beautiful girl with white hair who has reincarnated into another world.

highlighted.name: Perfume: The Story of a Cook

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at the workplace, such as general adult themes, gang activities, and criminal behavior.
All characters in the game are over the age of 20.

name: Dropped into the Modern World: Surviving the Red-Light District

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i3-2100 or similar
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce™ GTX 640 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i7-4600M or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce™ GTX 750 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: After an attack by a monster, the sorceress Daiya suddenly gets teleported to modern-world Kabukicho! Without a home and all alone, she gets offered shelter by a person named Kobeni. With their help, Daiya is able to start a new life, but can she return to her home world…?
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
